thread.title: Rihanna’s baby cousin Majesty has mastered the art of liquid eyeliner
thread.title_full: Rihanna’s baby cousin Majesty has mastered the art of liquid eyeliner

author: Essence
title: Rihanna’s baby cousin Majesty has mastered the art of liquid eyeliner
text:
Rihanna’s baby cousin Majesty has mastered the art of liquid eyeliner If there’s one thing we love about following Rihanna on Instagram, it’s seeing her in auntie mode.
We’ve watched Majesty, her adorable cousin, grow from a pint-sized newborn to beauty queen in the making and now, makeup is on the menu.
Last night (March 22), Aunty RiRi caught the two-year-old fine tuning her cat eye skills while no one was watching and of course, the results are adorable.
“when everybody asleep. and you been had plans for that liquid liner,” she captioned the selfie, showcasing Majesty’s drawn on brows and lashes.
when everybody asleep. and you been had plans for that liquid liner. #majesty # 
A post shared by badgalriri (@badgalriri) on Mar 22, 2017 at 1:46pm PDT 
Truth be told, she’s putting a lot of beauty novices to shame with her latest masterpiece. Late last year, the toddler got a lesson in nail care, painting both a mani and pedi, with the help of “Aunty Oh Na Na” of course.

A post shared by badgalriri (@badgalriri) on Oct 21, 2016 at 5:07pm PDT 
Related Links Rihanna is undoubtedly a fashion icon, here’s why 
Rihanna drops much-anticipated spring FENTY X PUMA collection 
Rihanna talks “Home” and how she related to her animated character, Tip 
aunty Oh Na Na taught me #Majesty 
A post shared by badgalriri (@badgalriri) on Oct 21, 2016 at 5:18pm PDT 
Are we watching a future makeup artist? Only time will tell with this adorable duo.
This article originally appeared in Essence.
